Notes: A platform that can move on a path, rotate or do both. It features two color animations. Normal.brk is used normally and Change.brk is used when its SW_B gets activated.

SW_APPEAR.Description: The object will appear when this switch is activated.

SW_B.Description: Starts the Change.brk color animation when activated. Normal.brk will be used when the switch is not activated.

SW_PARAM.Description: Animations, velocity and update rates are adjusted with ParamScale while this switch is activated.

SW_AWAKE.Description: The object will become visible and resume movement hwhen this switch is activated.

Rail.Description: The optional path that it can move on.

ClippingGroup.Description: Objects in this group are always clipped together.

DemoCast.Description: The object takes part in the cutscene.

BaseMtxFollowTarget.Description: Objects of this class can be followed by another BaseMtxFollower object.
